message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a unique opportunity worth $120 to you. I'd like to extend this exclusive offer at a special price of $110. Let me know if this works for you!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort. I would like to counter with a price of $105 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a competitive counteroffer. I propose to sell the product to you for $107. This is my best offer considering the value it holds for you.
I appreciate your effort, Alice. Based on my assessment, I would like to counter with a price of $106 for the product.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. Considering the value of the product and your interest, I am willing to accept a price of $106 for the product. This is my final offer, as it closely matches your valuation of the item.
